title: Boy Killed by Gunshot wound in Union Gap
content:
UNION GAP, WA - Union Gap Police say a 10-year-old boy died of a gunshot wound early Sunday.
Officers responded to 1815 West Ahtanum Road around 1:20 a.m. to reports of someone suffering from a gunshot wound.
Medics took him to a local hospital where he was pronounced dead.
Police are investigating. They do not believe this death is gang related.
Anyone with information should contact Sergeant McKinley at (509)248-0430.
